.45 has more "knockdown" to it, why I like it, but 9mm has more rounds per mag, reason I prefer it overall. Why trust 1 bullet? fire 2 if someone is proving to be a life threat, have enough to fire 2 for each instance of that threat.

.45 less bullet speed, more stopping power / more damage.

9mm, faster bullet / better penetration..
